site.topLine: Some memories… and the little stories behind them.
site.closingLine: If I could freeze time, I’d freeze it in the moments where you’re smiling.

items.title: Our first picture
items.preview: The day everything started feeling real.
items.story: Write your full story here. Keep it personal, short, and clean. 4–8 lines is perfect.

items.title: That little clip I love
items.preview: I keep rewatching this and smiling.
items.story: Explain why this moment matters. What you felt. What you noticed about her.
